title: Moody’s downgrades Israel again as economic costs of war mount
description:
Netanyahu says the military’s bombardment of Hezbollah targets will continue until Israelis displaced from northern communities are able to return home.

Israel was downgraded for the second time this year by Moody’s Ratings as the economic costs mount from almost 12 months of fighting in Gaza and a...

title: Israel-Lebanon conflict, stagnant unemployment in India, and more | The week in 5 charts
description:
